content.webTitle: Oliver Burkeman's Campaign Diary: Stars of The Wire urge you to vote

fields.headline: Stars of The Wire urge you to vote for Obama
fields.bodyText: See, John McCain, you want it to be one way. But it's the other way.* The election is officially over, and there is nothing more to say. (Except: Where's McNulty? Drunk in a gutter somewhere, presumably.) [via Ezra Klein] === *according to the preponderance of polling evidence
